review_content: These shoes are extremely comfortable and I feel that inserts would be unnecessary. I am 84 yrs old and often stand for 6 hours in the greenhouse on concrete floors. My feet are not the problem just my knees. The soles are cross trekker design and simply shifting my feet acts to massage the bottoms of my feet.

This is my first day waesring then and so far im very happy with them. i just could just tell the second i opened the box that these shoes were well made without any imperfections in the fit and finish they look great and they are also comfortable.! definitly would reccomend these

My son loves them. They fit great and were very comfortable. The rocks and tree roots didn't bother him on our last hike. He deliberately stepped in the water to see if he feet would stay dry and they did. Although the leaves were wet from the previous night rain he did not slip. I am very happy with my purchase.
Like this shoe a lot! Great fit lots of support and cushion. On my feet up to 6-8 hrs a day walking and or standing. Good shoe for an old guy who like me is still active a good deal/
My husband hurt his foot several years ago, and these do not hurt his foot.

I ordered the shoes by accident. I had intended to put them in my wish list and evidently hit order now instead. I was anticipating returning them as soon as they arrived but I thought well, try them on first. Boy am I glad I did! The shoes are awesomely comfortable and they fit perfectly! I'll admit I was first interested in the shoe because of the sapphire blue color, but they have exceeded my expectations! I'll definitely be a regular customer for this brand!

review_title: MOST COMFORTABLE SHOES I EVER OWNED
review_content: I love the products on Yes We Vibe. I have a pair of Mandala boots and the Glowing Lotus Shoes. The picture of the boots was spot on. I got what I saw. The Glowing Lotus Shoes looked like they were sparkly silver on black. But it's actually a greenish yellow on black. Initially I was disappointed, but once I put them on, they are so comfy, I didn't care that it was yellow/green instead of sparkly silver. I will buy more because I think these are just awesome shoes and I like pretty much every design they have..... so yeah... my husband better build me a shoe rack. M. Hernandez Salt Lake City, Utah
